I played one of the games here where the designer had used a black background. The thing is, the black background only occupied a portion of the screen's centre. Is it possible to have the whole screen in black, so that my game will look like the ones from the 70s/80s that I used to play on my Acorn Electron?

Thanks in advance.

Posts.EditableText: Click game in the left panel then click display. Select background to be black. Then you can change the width of that to cover the entire screen. There's also a 'theme' called retro which will make it black and use a retro font.
